mapper.select: select a.order_nm, a.order_name, a.order_con, a.order_set_cnt, b.order_cd, b.order_dt_type, b.order_dt_name, nvl(c.drug_io, 'n') as drug_io from orderset a left outer join order_detail b on a.order_nm = b.order_nm left outer join drug c on to_char(c.drug_nm) = b.order_cd where a.emp_id = #{empId}
